enigma_edit.lua.data

Class TileReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • enigma_edit.lua.data.Data
      • enigma_edit.lua.data.SourceData
        • enigma_edit.lua.data.FieldReference
          • enigma_edit.lua.data.TileReference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Assignable, Dereferencable, Source, TileDeclPart, Typed

    public class TileReference
extends FieldReference
implements TileDeclPart
    This is a special FieldReference, that stores a reference to a member of the Tiles-Resolver.
